alert.note: Alert for Spencer; Warrick (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 4:27PM EDT until July 02 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Warrick County in southwestern Indiana... Southern Spencer County in southwestern Indiana... Northern Daviess County in northwestern Kentucky... * Until 415 PM CDT. * At 327 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Eureka, or 7 miles southeast of Newburgh, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Owensboro, Newburgh, Rockport, Grandview, Stanley, Eureka and Chrisney. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
